Authors:
Miquel-Àngel PÉREZ-DE-GREGORIO, Marco Contu, Carles Roqué,
Enrico Ercole, Alfredo Vizzini
Title:
Marasmiellus celebanticus, a new species of Marasmiellus
sect. Candidi collected in the Mediterranean area
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, Agaricomycetes, marasmioid fungi, taxonomy,
Spain
Abstract:
Marasmiellus celebanticus, collected in the coastal area
of northeast Spain, is described and illustrated as a new species on the
basis of morphological features and ITS analysis. According to the
molecular data it is close to M. candidus in section Candidi, where it
occupies an isolate position due to its brown pileus and clavate
cheilocystidia.
